text: James David Matheson (born March 21, 1960) is an American politician, lobbyist and businessman. He was a United States Representative from Utah from 2001 to 2015. He represented Utah's 2nd district from 2001 to 2013 and its from 2013 to 2015 as a member of the Democratic Party. In December 2013, Matheson announced he would not run for re-election in the 2014 elections. When his political career ended, Matheson became a lobbyist. In 2016, he was named the CEO of National Rural Electric Cooperative Association. ==References== ==Other websites== * Links formerly displayed via the CongLinks template: * Biography at Ballotpedia * Congressional profile at GovTrack * Congressional profile at OpenCongress * Congressional profile at Roll Call * Financial information (federal office) at OpenSecrets.org * Financial investments (personal) at The Washington Post Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Utah Category:American lobbyists Category:Politicians from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:Businesspeople from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Jim Matheson
